title.rendered: Healthcare & Medical Education Department Job In Multan By 2024

content.rendered:
Healthcare & Medical Education Department Job In Multan By 2024. Medical Officer applications are being accepted by the Specialized Healthcare & Medical Education Department. A full-time position in Multan, Punjab, Pakistan, offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to the healthcare sector. A candidate with a Bachelor’s degree in medicine or a related field and relevant experience is ideal.

If you are interested in applying for this position, please send your resume, cover letter, and two references via email to [email protected] or by postal mail to the following address:

This job posting is for informational purposes only and is not legally binding. The Specialized Healthcare & Medical Education reserves the right to modify or withdraw the job offer at any time without prior notice. A minimum salary starts at 30000 rupees per month and goes up to 50000 rupees per month.

Contact Us to Publish Your Jobs Ads At statesaga.com

Healthcare & Medical Education Department Job In Multan By 2024

Date Posted: 17 August, 2024
Last Date: 08 October, 2024
Category: Government
Newspaper: Nation Jobs
Education: Intermediate, Bachelor, BS
Location: Multan, Punjab, Pakistan
Organization: Department of Specialized Healthcare & Medical Education
Job Type: Full Time

Latest Job In August 2024

  • Islamabad Exim Bank Job in 2024
  • NASTP Jobs in Islamabad, 2024
  • Job At Balochistan Wheels Limited In Karachi In August 2024
  • Job at Quaid e Azam Divisional Public School and College in 2024

In the Daily Nation Newspaper of 17 August 2024, there were vacancies for charge nurses at the Specialized Healthcare and Medical Education Department in Multan, Punjab Pakistan. Education qualifications include bachelor’s degrees, intermediate degrees, and so on.

Up until 8 October 2024, or until the newspaper job ad informs us of the closing date, there are a variety of government jobs available in the Specialized Department. To apply for the latest Specialized & Medical Education Department job opportunities, please read the complete ad online and follow the instructions.

Medical Job Application Process

Learn how to apply for medical jobs in Multan, from submission requirements to interview procedures. Stand out as a top candidate by showcasing your skills, experience, and passion for healthcare.
